department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Provision of standarized appliances and supplies
description: The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement to supply Federal Institutions under its control with standardized appliances and pricing on washers, dryers, refrigerators, freezers, ranges and microwaves to be purchased on an as-needed basis.
full_summary:
### Stream 1 - 21401-230009 - Institutional Appliances RFSO - Zone 2
#### Reference Number: WS4317503849-Doc4415886797
#### Amendment Number: 7
#### Solicitation Number: WS4317503849
#### Publication Date: 2024-02-26
#### Tender Closing Date and Time: **2024-04-19T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)**
#### Amendment Date: **2024-04-19**

**Tender Details**

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for a requirement to supply standardized appliances and pricing on washers, dryers, refrigerators, freezers, ranges, and microwaves to Federal Institutions under its control.

**Key Dates**

* Publication Date: 2024-02-26
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-04-19T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2024-04-19

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Region and Delivery**

The appliances will be supplied to institutions located in the Province of Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact:
Kat Nimuan, Contracting Officer
Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)/Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Phone: N/A
Email: [kat.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kat.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
